Bibliographic References: Greco, PdA, p. 45, pi. 29 (without the lid).
Imagery Description: Body: (a) Woman holding 'xylophone' in her left hand, seated on Ionic capital between nude youth holding cista, and draped woman. (b) Nude youth, with drapery over left arm, and woman with phiale, both running to right. Lid: (i) Head of youth to left, (b) rosette and palmettes; (ii) rosettes and palmettes; (iii) (a) female head, (b) head of youth; (iv) female head. On the shoulder are two plastic heads on either side, originally with added white for the visible flesh, now worn off.
